data.quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
data.author: Tim Notke

data.quote: A man can be as great as he wants to be. If you believe in yourself and have the courage, the determination, the dedication, the competitive drive and if you are willing to sacrifice the little things in life and pay the price for the things that are worthwhile, it can be done.
data.author: Vince Lombardi

data.quote: Every great story on the planet happened when someone decided not to give up, but kept going no matter what.
data.author: Spryte Loriano32

data.quote: Don't stop when you're tired. STOP when you are DONE.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
data.author: Og Mandino

data.quote: Success... seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
data.author: Conrad Hilton17

data.quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
data.author: W. Clement Stone15

data.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
data.author: Pablo Picasso

data.quote: The ones who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don't wish it were easier, wish you were better.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.
data.author: Ayn Rand

data.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go, so long as you do not stop.
data.author: Confucius

data.quote: Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above it.
data.author: Washington Irving

data.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
data.author: Thomas Jefferson

data.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do, so throw off the bowlines, sail away from safe harbor, catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore, Dream, Discover.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says "I'm possible"!
data.author: Audrey Hepburn

data.quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
data.author: Neale Donald Walsh

data.quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
data.author: Confucius

data.quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
data.author: Vince Lombardi

data.quote: Give me a stock clerk with a goal, and I will give you a man who will make history. Give me a man without a goal, and I will give you a stock clerk.
data.author: J.C. Penny

data.quote: Nothing in the world is more common than unsuccessful people with talent.
data.author: Unknown
